data.contentText:
Describe baby's progress during admission
If progess not covered by dropdown option, please complete free text section

fields.label: What progress did the baby make?
fields.values:
OB,Admitted for observation and progressed well
SE,Risk factors for sepsis and progressed well
ME,Meconium exposure and progressed well
RE,Respiratory distress resolved with no treatment
REO,Respiratory distress resolved with O2
FE,Feeding difficulties resolved with feeding support
JA,Jaundice resolved with phototherapy
JAS,Suspected jaundice with no phototherapy needed
MA,Admitted with macrosomia Blood sugars normal so discharged
CS,Confirmed sepsis treated successfully with antibiotics
SS,Suspected sepsis treated successfully with antibiotics
DI,Died shortly after admission
DE,Deteriorated and died despite interventions
DOA,Dead on arrival
OTH,Additional Information not covered above

fields.label: Describe progress during admission (if not covered above)

data.title: PROGRESS
